TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed MessageQueueErrorCode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 标识在消息队列应用程序中发生的并生成 异常的错误源。

span.span: Identifies the source of an error that occurred within the Message Queuing application and generated a exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举提供关于错误情况在消息传递操作过程的详细的信息。The enumeration gives detailed information about an error condition during a messaging operation. 使用属性用于标识消息队列错误性质。The uses the property to identify the nature of the Message Queuing error. 值确定要与错误关联的文本字符串。The value determines a text string to associate with the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例验证消息队列的队列是否存在，，然后将其删除。The following code example verifies whether a Message Queuing queue exists, and then deletes it. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CPP/mqexistsdelete.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CS/mqexistsdelete.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/VB/mqexistsdelete.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode AccessDenied = int32(-1072824283)

summary.span: 消息正文：“访问被拒绝。”

span.span: Message text: Access is denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列返回此错误，如果对指定的访问被拒绝队列或计算机。Message Queuing returns this error if access to the specified queue or computer is denied. 如果返回此错误，请验证你具有的操作，如创建、 删除，或为队列设置的属性的访问权限。If this error is returned, verify that you have access rights for the operation, such as creating, deleting, or setting properties for a queue. 有关更改队列的访问权限的信息，请参阅和主题。For information about changing access rights for a queue, see the and topics.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode BadSecurityContext = int32(-1072824267)

summary.span: 消息正文：“错误的安全上下文。”

span.span: Message text: Bad security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已损坏的安全上下文，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the security context has become corrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode Base = int32(-1072824320)

summary.span: 消息队列不返回此错误代码。

span.span: Message Queuing does not return this error code.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode BufferOverflow = int32(-1072824294)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为 MQReceiveMessage 检索消息体提供的缓冲区太小”。

span.span: Message text: The buffer supplied to MQReceiveMessage for message body retrieval was too small.

summary.span: “不从队列中移除消息，而且复制了缓冲区可容纳的部分消息体。”

span.span: The message is not removed from the queue and part of the message body that fits in the buffer was copied.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotCreateCertificateStore = int32(-1072824209)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法为内部证书创建证书存储区。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to create a certificate store for the internal certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你没有操作你自己的配置文件的权限，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if you do not have permission to manipulate your own profile.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotCreateHashEx = int32(-1072824191)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法为已验证身份的消息创建哈希对象。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to create a hash object for an authenticated message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅类的属性以获取有关哈希算法的详细信息。See the class's property for more information about hash algorithms.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotCreateOnGlobalCatalog = int32(-1072824201)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能在指定的全局编录服务器上创建对象。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to create an object on a specified global catalog server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotGetDistinguishedName = int32(-1072824194)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能检索到本地计算机的识别名。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to retrieve the distinguished name of local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotGrantAddGuid = int32(-1072824206)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能将‘添加 GUID’的权限授予当前用户。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to grant the "Add Guid" permission to current user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotHashDataEx = int32(-1072824193)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法对已验证身份的消息散列数据。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to hash data for an authenticated message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotImpersonateClient = int32(-1072824284)

summary.span: 消息正文：“RPC 服务器无法模拟客户端应用程序，因此未能验证安全凭据。”

span.span: Message text: The RPC server cannot impersonate the client application, hence security credentials could not be verified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目录服务服务器无法模拟客户端应用程序，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the directory service server cannot impersonate the client application. 这是需要验证的安全凭据。This is necessary to verify the security credentials.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotJoinDomain = int32(-1072824202)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能联接 Windows 2000 域上的‘消息队列’企业版。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to join Message Queuing enterprise on Windows 2000 domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotLoadMsmqOcm = int32(-1072824205)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法加载 MSMQOCM.DLL 库。”

span.span: Message text: Cannot load the MSMQOCM.DLL library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotOpenCertificateStore = int32(-1072824208)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法为内部证书打开证书存储区。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to open the certificates store for the internal certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你没有操作你自己的配置文件的权限，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if you do not have permission to manipulate your own profile.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotSetCryptographicSecurityDescriptor = int32(-1072824212)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法为加密密钥设置安全说明符。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to set the security descriptor for the cryptographic keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关加密提供程序的信息，请参阅和主题。For information about cryptographic providers, see the and topics.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CannotSignDataEx = int32(-1072824192)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法在发送已验证身份的消息之前对数据签名。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to sign data before sending an authenticated message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅类的属性以获取有关对数据进行签名的详细信息。See the class's property for more information about signing data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CertificateNotProvided = int32(-1072824211)

summary.span: 消息正文：“用户尝试发送没有证书的已验证身份消息。”

span.span: Message text: A user attempted to send an authenticated message without a certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果发送应用程序尝试使用安全上下文信息进行身份验证消息，并且安全上下文不包括证书，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the sending application attempts to use security context information to authenticate a message, and the security context does not include a certificate. 有关证书的详细信息，请参阅类的属性。For more information about certificates, see the class's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode ComputerDoesNotSupportEncryption = int32(-1072824269)

summary.span: 消息正文：“计算机不支持加密操作。”

span.span: Message text: The computer does not support encryption operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列会将返回此错误的应用程序请求加密和的计算机 （源或目标） 时不支持加密操作。Message Queuing returns this error when the application requests encryption and the computer (source or destination) does not support encryption operations. 返回此错误，则加密操作将失败。When this error is returned, the encryption operation fails. 有关使用加密的详细信息，请参阅和主题。For more information about using encryption, see the and topics.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CorruptedInternalCertificate = int32(-1072824275)

summary.span: 消息正文：“内部消息队列证书已损坏。”

span.span: Message text: The internal Message Queuing certificate is corrupted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此错误仅适用于消息队列 1.0。This error applies only to Message Queuing 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CorruptedPersonalCertStore = int32(-1072824271)

summary.span: 消息正文：“个人证书存储区已损坏。”

span.span: Message text: The personal certificate store is corrupted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Microsoft Internet Explorer 个人证书存储已损坏时，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error when the Microsoft Internet Explorer personal certificate store is corrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CorruptedQueueWasDeleted = int32(-1072824216)

summary.span: 消息正文：“LQS 中队列的 .ini 文件因损坏而被删除。”

span.span: Message text: The.ini file for the queue in LQS was deleted because it was corrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CorruptedSecurityData = int32(-1072824272)

summary.span: 消息正文：“加密函数已失败。”

span.span: Message text: A cryptographic function has failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CouldNotGetAccountInfo = int32(-1072824265)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能得到该用户的帐户信息。”

span.span: Message text: Could not get the account information for the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode CouldNotGetUserSid = int32(-1072824266)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能从线程标记中获取 SID 信息。”

span.span: Message text: Could not get the SID information out of the thread token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关发件人标识符的详细信息，请参阅类的属性。For more information about sender identifiers, see the class's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode DeleteConnectedNetworkInUse = int32(-1072824248)

summary.span: 消息正文：“已连接的网络正在使用中，无法删除。”

span.span: Message text: The connected network cannot be deleted; it is in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列返回此错误，如果它不能删除指定连接的网络，因为至少一台其他计算机中没有定义网络。Message Queuing returns this error if it cannot delete the specified connected network because the network is defined in at least one other computer. 从所有连接的网络列表中删除连接的网络，然后重试可将其删除。Remove the connected network from all connected network lists and try again to delete it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode DependentClientLicenseOverflow = int32(-1072824217)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此消息队列服务器所服务的非独立客户端的数目已达到该服务器的上限。”

span.span: Message text: The number of dependent clients served by this Message Queuing server reached its upper limit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode DsError = int32(-1072824253)

summary.span: 消息正文：“内部目录服务错误。”

span.span: Message text: Internal directory service error.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode DsIsFull = int32(-1072824254)

summary.span: 消息正文：“目录服务已满。”

span.span: Message text: Directory service is full.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果信息存储已满，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the information store is full. 此错误仅适用于消息队列 1.0。This error applies only to Message Queuing 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode DtcConnect = int32(-1072824244)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法连接到 MS DTC。”

span.span: Message text: Cannot connect to MS DTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法连接到 Microsoft 分布式事务处理协调器，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it is unable to connect to the Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode EncryptionProviderNotSupported = int32(-1072824213)

summary.span: 消息正文：“消息队列不支持加密服务提供程序。”

span.span: Message text: The Cryptographic Service Provider is not supported by Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode FailVerifySignatureEx = int32(-1072824190)

summary.span: 消息正文：“已接收消息的签名无效。”

span.span: Message text: Signature of received message is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode FormatNameBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824289)

summary.span: 消息正文：“提供给 API 的格式名缓冲区太小，无法容纳格式名。”

span.span: Message text: The format name buffer supplied to the API was too small to fit the format name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode Generic = int32(-1072824319)

summary.span: 消息正文：“一般性错误。”

span.span: Message text: Generic Error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它不能识别更具体的源，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it cannot identify a more specific source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode GuidNotMatching = int32(-1072824200)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能创建其 GUID 与计算机安装相匹配的消息队列配置对象。”。

span.span: Message text: Failed to create Message Queuing configuration object with a GUID that matches the computer installation.

summary.span: “必须卸载‘消息队列’，然后重新安装它。”

span.span: You must uninstall Message Queuing and then reinstall it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalContext = int32(-1072824229)

summary.span: 消息正文：“上下文参数无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid context parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalCriteriaColumns = int32(-1072824264)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无效的 MQCOLUMNS 参数。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid MQCOLUMNS parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列返回此错误，如果你使用`MessagePropertyFilter`类中，并选择`false`用于所有布尔值，并为所有的整数值零 (0)。Message Queuing returns this error if you are using the `MessagePropertyFilter` class and have selected `false` for all Boolean values and zero (0) for all integer values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalCursorAction = int32(-1072824292)

summary.span: 消息正文：“指定给 MQReceiveMessage 的 MQ_ACTION_PEEK_NEXT 不能与当前游标位置一起使用。”

span.span: Message text: MQ_ACTION_PEEK_NEXT specified to MQReceiveMessage can not be used with the current cursor position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.MoveNext` 不能用于当前光标位置。`System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.MoveNext` cannot be used with the current cursor position.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalEnterpriseOperation = int32(-1072824207)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此操作对消息队列服务对象无效。”

span.span: Message text: The operation is invalid for a Message Queuing services object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalFormatName = int32(-1072824290)

summary.span: 消息正文：“给定的格式名称无效。”

span.span: Message text: The given format name is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关有效的格式名称语法选项，请参阅类的属性。For valid format name syntax options, see the class's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalMessageProperties = int32(-1072824255)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQQMPROPS 参数无效，该参数为 null 或者没有属性。”

span.span: Message text: Illegal MQQMPROPS parameter, either null or with zero properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非法消息属性，或者`null`或者没有属性。Illegal message properties, either `null` or with zero properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalOperation = int32(-1072824220)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此操作在外部消息队列系统上无效。”

span.span: Message text: The operation is invalid on foreign message queuing systems.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalPrivateProperties = int32(-1072824197)

summary.span: 私有属性参数值无效。

span.span: The private properties parameter value is invalid.

summary.span: 这可能是因为它的值为 null 或者没有指定属性。

span.span: This may be because it has a null value or has zero properties specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalPropertyId = int32(-1072824263)

summary.span: 消息正文：“属性标识符值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid property identifier value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalPropertySize = int32(-1072824261)

summary.span: 消息正文：“属性缓冲区大小无效。”

span.span: Message text: Illegal property buffer size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息标识符或相关性标识符指定的缓冲区不是正确的大小，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the specified buffer for the message identifier or correlation identifier is not the correct size. 请参阅有关消息标识符的详细信息的 Message 类 Message.Id 和 Message.CorrelationId 属性。See the Message class's Message.Id and Message.CorrelationId properties for more information about message identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalPropertyValue = int32(-1072824296)

summary.span: 消息正文：“属性值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid property value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalPropertyVt = int32(-1072824295)

summary.span: 消息正文：“VARTYPE 值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid VARTYPE value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalQueuePathName = int32(-1072824300)

summary.span: 消息正文：“队列路径名无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid queue path name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅类的有关有效的路径语法选项的属性。See the class's property for valid path syntax options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalQueueProperties = int32(-1072824259)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQQUEUEPROPS 参数无效，该参数为 null 或者没有属性。”

span.span: Message text: Illegal MQQUEUEPROPS parameter, either null or with zero properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非法队列属性，`null`或者没有属性。Illegal Queue Properties, either `null` or with zero properties. 消息队列返回此错误，如果你使用类，并且已调用或尚未指定任何条件，用于筛选队列时。Message Queuing returns this error if you are using the class and have called or have not specified any criteria to use when filtering queues. 有关筛选队列搜索条件的详细信息，请参阅 MessageQueueCriteria 类或 MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues。See the MessageQueueCriteria class or MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues for more information about filtering queue search criteria.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalRelation = int32(-1072824262)

summary.span: 消息正文：“限制中的关系值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid relation value in restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalRestrictionPropertyId = int32(-1072824260)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQRESTRICTION 参数中的 PropId 值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid propid value in MQRESTRICTION parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限制的无效的属性标识符值。Invalid property identifier value for restriction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalSecurityDescriptor = int32(-1072824287)

summary.span: 消息正文：“指定的安全说明符不是有效的安全说明符。”

span.span: Message text: The specified security descriptor is not a valid security descriptor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalSort = int32(-1072824304)

summary.span: 消息正文：“指定的排序（例如，重复列）无效。”

span.span: Message text: Illegal sort specified (for example, duplicate columns).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalSortPropertyId = int32(-1072824228)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQSORTSET 中的 PropId 值无效。”

span.span: Message text: Invalid propid value in MQSORTSET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无效的属性标识符值以排序。Invalid property identifier value in for sort.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IllegalUser = int32(-1072824303)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此用户的用户名无效。”

span.span: Message text: The user has an invalid user name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的应用程序通过无效的用户名进行连接到它，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if your application is connecting to it through an invalid user name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InsufficientProperties = int32(-1072824257)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未在输入参数中指定该操作必需的所有属性。”

span.span: Message text: Not all the required properties for the operation were specified in the input parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InsufficientResources = int32(-1072824281)

summary.span: 消息正文：“执行操作所需的资源不足。”

span.span: Message text: Insufficient resources to perform operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列会将返回此错误，例如，如果没有足够的内存来完成该操作。Message Queuing returns this error, for example, if there is not enough memory to complete the operation. 返回此错误时，操作将失败。When this error is returned, the operation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InvalidCertificate = int32(-1072824276)

summary.span: 消息正文：“用户证书无效。”

span.span: Message text: The user certificate is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定的安全证书，消息队列返回此错误类的属性是无效的或如果证书不正确放置的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 个人证书存储中。Message Queuing returns this error if the security certificate specified in the class's property is invalid, or if the certificate is not correctly placed in the Microsoft Internet Explorer personal certificate store.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InvalidHandle = int32(-1072824313)

summary.span: 消息正文：“传递给函数的句柄无效。”

span.span: Message text: An invalid handle passed to a function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的队列句柄无效，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the specified queue handle is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InvalidOwner = int32(-1072824252)

summary.span: 消息正文：“对象所有者无效。”。

span.span: Message text: Invalid object owner.

summary.span: “例如，由于队列管理器对象无效导致 CreateQueue 失败。”

span.span: For example CreateQueue failed because the Queue Manager object is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列会将返回此错误，例如，如果你的应用程序尝试在未安装消息队列的计算机上创建队列。Message Queuing returns this error, for example, if your application attempts to create a queue on a computer on which Message Queuing is not installed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode InvalidParameter = int32(-1072824314)

summary.span: 消息正文：“传递给函数的参数无效。”

span.span: Message text: An invalid parameter passed to a function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列返回此错误，如果该操作所提供的参数之一无效。Message Queuing returns this error if one of the parameters supplied by the operation is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode IOTimeout = int32(-1072824293)

summary.span: 消息正文：“接收或查看消息超时时间已到。”

span.span: Message text: The receive or peek message time-out has expired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对的调用中指定的超时，消息队列返回此错误或过期之前有新消息到达队列中。Message Queuing returns this error if the time-out specified in a call to or expires before a new message arrives in the queue. 如果没有任何消息已在队列中; 仅可以看见如果存在一条消息，这两种方法将立即返回。This can only happen if there was no message already in the queue; both methods would return immediately if a message exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode LabelBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824226)

summary.span: 消息正文：“提供给 API 的标签缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The label buffer supplied to the API was too small.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MachineExists = int32(-1072824256)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此站点中已存在同名的计算机。”

span.span: Message text: Computer with the same name already exists in the site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MachineNotFound = int32(-1072824307)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能找到指定的计算机。”

span.span: Message text: The specified computer could not be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它找不到目录服务中的队列的计算机，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it cannot find the queue's computer in the directory service.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MessageAlreadyReceived = int32(-1072824291)

summary.span: 消息正文：“游标当前指向的消息已被另一个进程或另一个在不使用此游标的情况下接收消息的调用从该队列中移除。”

span.span: Message text: A message that is currently pointed at by the cursor has been removed from the queue by another process or by another call to receive the message without the use of this cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某些其他光标、 应用程序或系统管理员已从队列删除消息时，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error when some other cursor, application, or the system administrator has already removed the message from the queue. 此错误是最有可能使用时可能发生类，如通过调用返回的实例或。This error is most likely to occur when using the class, such as the instance returned through a call to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MessageNotFound = int32(-1072824184)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能找到指定的消息。”

span.span: Message text: The specified message could not be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不到指定的消息在队列中，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it cannot find the specified message in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MessageStorageFailed = int32(-1072824278)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能存储可恢复的消息或日记消息。”。

span.span: Message text: Could not store a recoverable or journal message.

summary.span: 没有发送消息。

span.span: Message was not sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果本地计算机不能存储可恢复的消息 （一个在网络问题的情况下确保其传递） 或日志消息，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the local computer cannot store a recoverable message (one whose delivery is guaranteed in the case of a network problem) or a journal message. 请参阅类的和有关这些消息发送选项的详细信息的属性。See the class's and properties for more information about these message sending options.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MissingConnectorType = int32(-1072824235)

summary.span: 消息正文：“在发送确认或安全消息时，连接器类型是强制的。”

span.span: Message text: Connector Type is mandatory when sending an Acknowledgment or secure message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序设置通常由消息队列，设置一个属性，但未指定要使用的连接器时，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error when the application sets a property typically set by Message Queuing, but does not specify the connector to use. 有关连接器类型的详细信息，请参阅类的属性。For more information about connector types, see the class's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MqisReadOnlyMode = int32(-1072824224)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQIS 数据库处于只读模式。”

span.span: Message text: MQIS database is in read-only mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode MqisServerEmpty = int32(-1072824225)

summary.span: 消息正文：“MQIS 服务器列表（在注册表中）为空。”

span.span: Message text: The list of MQIS servers (in registry) is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此错误仅适用于消息队列 1.0。This error applies only to Message Queuing 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoDs = int32(-1072824301)

summary.span: 消息正文：“没有与此站点控制器的连接。”

span.span: Message text: No connection with this site's controller(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序无法访问目录服务，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the application cannot access the directory service. 如果返回此错误，请验证用于访问目录服务的权限。If this error is returned, verify permissions for accessing the directory service.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoEntryPointMsmqOcm = int32(-1072824204)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法在 MSMQOCM.DLL 库中找到入口点。”

span.span: Message text: Cannot locate an entry point in the MSMQOCM.DLL library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoGlobalCatalogInDomain = int32(-1072824196)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能在指定域中找到全局编录服务器。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to find Global Catalog servers in the specified domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoInternalUserCertificate = int32(-1072824273)

summary.span: 消息正文：“用户的内部消息队列证书不存在。”

span.span: Message text: The internal Message Queuing certificate for the user does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有内部证书注册或已注册的证书已损坏，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if no internal certificate is registered or the registered certificate is corrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoMsmqServersOnDc = int32(-1072824203)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能在域控制器上找到消息队列服务器。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to find Message Queuing servers on domain controllers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoMsmqServersOnGlobalCatalog = int32(-1072824195)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能在全局编录域控制器上找到消息队列服务器。”

span.span: Message text: Failed to find Message Queuing servers on Global Catalog domain controllers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode NoResponseFromObjectServer = int32(-1072824247)

summary.span: 消息正文：“对象所有者没有响应。”

span.span: Message text: No response from object owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从目录服务服务器没有响应，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if there is no response from the directory service server. 返回此错误时，该操作的状态是未知的。When this error is returned, the status of the operation is unknown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode ObjectServerNotAvailable = int32(-1072824246)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法访问对象所有者。”

span.span: Message text: Object owner is not reachable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未提供目录服务服务器的对象时，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the directory service server for the object is not available. 返回此错误时，操作将失败。When this error is returned, the operation fails.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode OperationCanceled = int32(-1072824312)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此操作在完成前被取消。”

span.span: Message text: The operation was canceled before it could be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode PrivilegeNotHeld = int32(-1072824282)

summary.span: 消息正文：“客户端没有执行此操作所需的特权。”

span.span: Message text: Client does not have the required privileges to perform the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode Property = int32(-1072824318)

summary.span: 消息正文：“传递的一个或多个属性无效。”

span.span: Message text: One or more of the passed properties are invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode PropertyNotAllowed = int32(-1072824258)

summary.span: 消息正文：“所请求操作的属性无效”

span.span: Message text: Invalid property for the requested operation

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode ProviderNameBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824221)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为提供程序名称属性传递的缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The passed buffer for the Provider name property is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅有关提供程序名称的详细信息的 Message 类 AuthenticationProviderName 属性。See the Message class's AuthenticationProviderName property for more information about provider names.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode PublicKeyDoesNotExist = int32(-1072824198)

summary.span: 消息正文：“此计算机的公钥不存在。”

span.span: Message text: The public key for the computer does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它无法查询目录服务，但找不到增强型的密钥，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it was able to query the directory service, but the enhanced key was not found. 此错误仅适用于 Message Queuing 2.0。This error applies only to Message Queuing 2.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode PublicKeyNotFound = int32(-1072824199)

summary.span: 消息正文：“未能找到计算机的公钥。”

span.span: Message text: Unable to find the public key for computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列会将返回此错误，例如，如果你尝试检索运行消息队列 1.0 的计算机的计算机属性或如果你正在脱机工作时获取远程计算机属性。Message Queuing returns this error, for example, if you are trying to retrieve the computer properties of a computer running Message Queuing 1.0 or if you are trying to get remote computer properties while working offline. 此错误仅适用于 Message Queuing 2.0。This error applies only to Message Queuing 2.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode QDnsPropertyNotSupported = int32(-1072824210)

summary.span: 不支持将 DNS 属性作为队列搜索条件。

span.span: DNS property is not supported as criteria to locate queues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法检索队列的 DNS 路径名称。You cannot retrieve the DNS path name of a queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode QueueDeleted = int32(-1072824230)

summary.span: 消息正文：“已删除队列。”。

span.span: Message text: The queue was deleted.

summary.span: “使用此队列实例无法再接收任何消息。”。

span.span: Messages cannot be received anymore using this queue instance.

summary.span: “应关闭队列。”

span.span: The queue should be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode QueueExists = int32(-1072824315)

summary.span: 消息正文：“已注册具有相同路径名的队列。”

span.span: Message text: A queue with the same pathname is already registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列目录服务中注册公用队列，并注册本地计算机上的专用队列。Message Queuing registers public queues in the directory service, and registers private queues on the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode QueueNotAvailable = int32(-1072824245)

summary.span: 消息正文：“在从驻留于远程计算机上的队列中读取时出错。”

span.span: Message text: Error while reading from a queue residing on a remote computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode QueueNotFound = int32(-1072824317)

summary.span: 消息正文：“队列未在目录服务中注册。”

span.span: Message text: The queue is not registered in the directory service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它找不到队列，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if it cannot find the queue. 这包括未在目录服务和消息队列命名空间中不存在的 Internet 队列中注册的公共队列。This includes public queues not registered in the directory service and Internet queues that do not exist in the Message Queuing namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode RemoteMachineNotAvailable = int32(-1072824215)

summary.span: 消息正文：“远程计算机不可用。”

span.span: Message text: The remote machine is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode ResultBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824250)

summary.span: 消息正文：“提供的结果缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The supplied result buffer is too small.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SecurityDescriptorBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824285)

summary.span: 消息正文：“传递给 MQGetQueueSecurity 的缓冲区大小太小。”

span.span: Message text: The size of the buffer passed to MQGetQueueSecurity is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供的安全缓冲区太小的安全描述符，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the supplied security buffer is too small for the security descriptor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SenderCertificateBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824277)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为用户证书属性传递的缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The passed buffer for the user certificate property is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅有关用户证书的详细信息的 Message 类 System.Messaging.Message.SenderCertificate 属性。See the Message class's System.Messaging.Message.SenderCertificate property for more information about user certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SenderIdBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824286)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为用户标识符属性传递的缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The passed buffer for the user identifier property is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列会将返回此错误时提供的发送方标识缓冲区太小。Message Queuing returns this error when the supplied sender identification buffer is too small. 请参阅有关发件人标识符的详细信息的 Message 类 System.Messaging.Message.SenderId 属性。See the Message class's System.Messaging.Message.SenderId property for more information about sender identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode ServiceNotAvailable = int32(-1072824309)

summary.span: 消息正文：“消息队列服务不可用。”

span.span: Message text: The Message Queues service is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序无法连接到的队列管理器，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the application is unable to connect to the Queue Manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SharingViolation = int32(-1072824311)

summary.span: 消息正文：“共享冲突。”。

span.span: Message text: Sharing violation.

summary.span: “队列已被打开用于独占接收。”

span.span: The queue is already opened for exclusive receive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序尝试打开已打开的具有独占读取的权限的队列，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if an application is trying to open an already opened queue that has exclusive read rights. 有关以独占方式从队列接收消息的详细信息，请参阅类的属性。For more information about receiving messages exclusively from a queue, see the class's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SignatureBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824222)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为签名属性传递的缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The passed buffer for the Signature property is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅有关签名的详细信息的 Message 类 DigitalSignature 属性。See the Message class's DigitalSignature property for more information about signatures.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode StaleHandle = int32(-1072824234)

summary.span: 消息正文：“已重新启动队列管理器服务。”

span.span: Message text: The Queue Manager service has been restarted.

summary.span: “队列句柄已失效，应将其关闭。”

span.span: The queue handle is stale and should be closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的句柄已获取在队列管理器服务的以前的会话中，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if the specified handle was obtained in a previous session of the Queue Manager service.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode SymmetricKeyBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824223)

summary.span: 消息正文：“为对称密钥属性传递的缓冲区太小。”

span.span: Message text: The passed buffer for the Symmetric key property is too small.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅有关对称密钥的详细信息的 Message 类 DestinationSymmetricKey 属性。See the Message class's DestinationSymmetricKey property for more information about symmetric keys.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode TransactionEnlist = int32(-1072824232)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法登记事务。”

span.span: Message text: Cannot enlist the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode TransactionImport = int32(-1072824242)

summary.span: 消息正文：“无法导入事务。”

span.span: Message text: Cannot import the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode TransactionSequence = int32(-1072824239)

summary.span: 消息正文：“错误的事务操作序列。”

span.span: Message text: Wrong transaction operations sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode TransactionUsage = int32(-1072824240)

summary.span: 消息正文：“错误的事务使用。”

span.span: Message text: Wrong transaction usage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试打开远程队列进行读取访问权限从在事务中，或尝试从在事务中从非事务性队列中读取一条消息，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error if an attempt was made to open a remote queue for read access from within a transaction, or an attempt was made to read a message from a non-transactional queue from within a transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode UnsupportedAccessMode = int32(-1072824251)

summary.span: 消息正文：“不支持指定的访问模式。”

span.span: Message text: The specified access mode is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列返回此错误，如果访问模式指定当打开队列设置为无效值，或访问模式和共享模式指定不兼容。Message Queuing returns this error if the access mode specified when opening the queue is set to an invalid value, or the access mode and the share mode specified are not compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode UnsupportedFormatNameOperation = int32(-1072824288)

summary.span: 消息正文：“不支持对指定格式名称执行请求的操作。”

span.span: Message text: The requested operation for the specified format name is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求的操作不支持指定的格式名称时，消息队列将返回此错误。Message Queuing returns this error when the requested operation is not supported for the specified format name. 操作包括尝试打开队列以接收消息，通过指定直接格式名。Operations include trying to open a queue to receive messages by specifying a direct format name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode UnsupportedOperation = int32(-1072824214)

summary.span: 消息正文：“WORKGROUP 安装计算机不支持此操作。”

span.span: Message text: The operation is not supported for a WORKGROUP installation computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode UserBufferTooSmall = int32(-1072824280)

summary.span: 消息正文：“由于用户缓冲区太小，无法容纳返回的信息，请求失败。”

span.span: Message text: Request failed because user buffer is too small to hold the returned information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode WksCantServeClient = int32(-1072824218)

summary.span: 消息正文：“独立于消息队列的客户端无法为依赖于消息队列的客户端提供服务。”

span.span: Message text: Message Queuing-independent clients cannot serve Message Queuing-dependent clients.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueErrorCode WriteNotAllowed = int32(-1072824219)

summary.span: 消息正文：“正在安装另一个 MQIS 服务器；此时不允许向数据库进行写操作。”

span.span: Message text: Another MQIS server is being installed; write operations to the database are not allowed at this time.
